#Problem 1

Creating a data frame as instructed.

```{r problem_1}

set.seed(1)
problem1_df = tibble( 
                        vec_numeric_col1 = runif(n = 10, min = 0, max = 5),
                        vec_logical_col2 = vec_numeric_col1 > 2,
                        vec_char_col3 = c("This", "is", "my", "first", "try", "with", "using", "R", "and", "RStudio"),
                        vec_factor_col4 = factor(c("Male", "Female", "Female", "Female", "Female", "Male", "Female", "Male", "Male", "Female"))
                      )
  
problem1_df
```
